scripts.test:unity: npm run docker:test && docker exec -it telzir_api_test npm run test:unity -- --watchAll
scripts.test:int: npm run docker:test && docker exec -it telzir_api_test npm run test:int -- --watchAll
scripts.test:e2e: npm run docker:test && docker exec -it telzir_api_test npm run test:e2e -- --watchAll
scripts.test:all: npm run docker:test && sleep 1 && docker exec telzir_api_test npm run test:all
